title: Green Life
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Build-your-own salads, craft sandwiches, protein bowls, and fresh juices and smoothies. Vegan and gluten free choices available on mostly everything. Also offers pre-packaged chips/cookies/snacks, some being both vegan and gluten free. Hummus-avocado-tofu wrap is vegan. A bright, fun atmosphere.
